title: API
subTitle: February 2012 - January 2014
role: Designed and developed an API that we use across Teletoon, Teletoon Retro, Cartoon Network and Adult Swim.

details.description: The API is designed to assume that anything that calls it is essentially a view of an MVC pattern. As such, it is scalable both in terms adding new sections and extending existing sections. The API currently manages:
items: game play tracking (creating, updating, high score display)
rating a piece of content, currently implemented in games on Cartoon Network
custom link tracking, such as when a user clicks on the Rules & Regulations of a contest
image galleries: retrieves a range of data from a specified database table according to pagination parameters set by a client
